response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This product holds immense value to me and represents years of dedication and innovation. My goal is to ensure that it finds a home where its true potential can be realized.

I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $850,000. This price reflects my commitment to finding the right owner who will appreciate and utilize the product to its fullest extent. I understand that the value of such a product may be subjective, but I trust that you will see the exceptional quality and benefits it offers.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am more than happy to provide additional information or arrange a time for us to meet and explore the possibilities together.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 850000}
